resource.chars:
Mr. Gosse’s memoir does not seem to me 
to contain a sufficient number of new &
important facts to justify its publication 
in the Transactions of the Royal Society.
And even were the observational value 
of the paper greater - many of its authors 
views and statements appear to me 
to be open to very important objections 
I will proceed to state these at some 
length in justification of my opinion 
that the paper should not be published
